['No longer grants the War Club ability.', 'Now increases  Grow Tossed unit bonus damage from 35%/50%/65% to 50%/65%/80%.', 'Now causes  Grow to increase attack range by 107, grant a 50% damage cleave with a 400 radius and causes attacks to deal 75% more damage to structures.', "Tiny visually equips a tree when having Aghanim's Scepter.", "Reworked  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade

Now causes  Grow to increase attack range by 107, grant a 50% damage cleave with a 400 radius and causes attacks to deal 75% more damage to structures.
Tiny visually equips a tree when having Aghanim's Scepter."]

["Fixed Tiny's illusions appearing small with any  Grow level.", ' Craggy Exterior\nNow increases armor by 3/4/5/6.\nNow procs on any attack from within 300 range around Tiny, instead of proccing on melee attacks regardless of distance.', 'Now increases armor by 3/4/5/6.', 'Now procs on any attack from within 300 range around Tiny, instead of proccing on melee attacks regardless of distance.']

['Now damages tossed units twice, instead of hitting them indefinite times.', 'No longer affects ancient creeps and Roshan.', ' Avalanche
Now damages tossed units twice, instead of hitting them indefinite times.
No longer affects ancient creeps and Roshan.', ' Toss
No longer uses mana cost/cooldown if the cast because of no valid tossable units being nearby.
Now seeks its target, instead of landing where the target was upon cast (not disjointable).
Now deals magical damage, instead of universal damage.', 'No longer uses mana cost/cooldown if the cast because of no valid tossable units being nearby.', 'Now seeks its target, instead of landing where the target was upon cast (not disjointable).', 'Now deals magical damage, instead of universal damage.', 'Fixed a minor bug with  Grow.']

['Tossed allied units always take the 20% damage, no matter on what level Grow is.', 'Reduced  Tossed unit extra damage from 50% to 20%. Each level of  Grow now increases that damage by 15% (to 35%/50%/65%).
Tossed allied units always take the 20% damage, no matter on what level Grow is.', " Grow
No longer grants 1 armor per level (1/2/3 -> 0/0/0)
Recoded ability to get rid of the following unwanted effects upon leveling:
Refreshing of all of Tiny's ability and item cooldowns.
disjointing of projectiles.
dispelling of buffs and debuffs.
Clearing of targetings done towards Tiny, including aggro loss from lane and neutral creeps.
Interrupting of Tiny's current orders.", 'No longer grants 1 armor per level (1/2/3 -> 0/0/0)', 'Recoded ability to get rid of the following unwanted effects upon leveling:']
["Fixed Tiny's movement speed not displaying correctly after leveling  Grow."]
